1525920.name: SNS
1525920.description:
This is an early access game and will continue to be updated.

Step into a world where flesh transcends metal, and biotechnology reigns supreme.

Synesthesia Synthetica is a Biopunk table top roleplaying game built for digital and real life play. On an alternate future earth, after a horrific calamity knocks technological progress into a tailspin, the world is wholly entrenched in a snowy hellscape with Biotechnology at the forefront of the battle against the elements.

Flesh replaces metal, bones line the interior. Rainfall patters on endless snow. Neon plastic jackets glow, blood vibrant against the white expanse. 

In SNS, you craft your journey by choosing from 14 archetypes, split into 4 types, roles that define your skills, playstyle, and identity. Whether you soar as a daring Cloudkin, command loyalty as a Hivehead, or manipulate the masses as a Charlatan, each archetype offers unique abilities and challenges.

Voyagers: Navigate skies and seas, exploring the unknown.
Lawbreakers: Rule the frozen underworld with wit and force.
Aristocrats: Wield influence to reshape society.
Specialists: Innovate and heal in a world driven by biotech.

Your genotype, a genetic blueprint of evolution, further shapes your character. Choose to wield the fiery tenacity of the Hellion, the eerie intellect of a Cognitive, or the sheer resilience of a Syllabub. These enhancements entwine your identity with the world’s chilling demands and remarkable possibilities.

What you get with this application

An interactive saveable and shareable tabletop character builder for the tabletop game Synethesia Synthetica, aka SNS.

an ingame audio-player supplied with custom SNS themed music tracks

Access to all future content free of charge, meaning DLC, Extra characters, New maps and any other planned content.
1525920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
